alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Darke; Miami; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 06 at 4:27AM EST until March 06 at 4:45AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM EST FOR SHELBY...NORTHEASTERN DARKE...CENTRAL AUGLAIZE AND NORTHERN MIAMI COUNTIES... At 426 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lima to near Arcanum, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. A recent wind gust of 56 mph was observed at Versailles Darke County Airport. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Troy, Sidney, Piqua, Greenville, Wapakoneta, New Bremen, Minster, Versailles, Covington, Newport, Cridersville, Bradford, Anna, Fort Loramie, Jackson Center, Pleasant Hill, Botkins, New Knoxville, Waynesfield and Hardin. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 76 and 118. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
